item.title: Michael Fassbender Warmly Recalls Gerard Butler's Support On 300 Set 18 Years After It Launched His Movie Career
item.description: While looking back at his career, Michael Fassbender fondly reflects on the experience of working alongside Gerard Butler on the set of 300.

item.title: 8 Ways Disney's Live-Action Snow White Is Worse Than The 1937 Original
item.description: Disney achieved something lovely with its live-action Snow White remake, but there are ways this movie doesn't stack up to the 1937 original.

item.title: Sunrise On The Reaping's Most Gruesome Death Just Made One Hunger Games Character's Backstory Way More Devastating
item.description: Sunrise on the Reaping features one of the most gruesome deaths in The Hunger Games franchise, and it makes one Catching Fire character more tragic.
